backend_llm_notes: Claude Sonnet 4.5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Starting next week, I want a weekly 30-min 1:1 with {name}. Afternoons preferred, avoid Fridays. Automatically reschedule on declines or conflicts.

gutts.name: Constraint Extraction & Formalization
gutts.capability: Parse scheduling requirements into structured constraints (weekly recurrence, duration, time preferences, exclusions)
gutts.user_goal: System understands all scheduling rules and preferences

gutts.name: Multi-Calendar Availability Checking
gutts.capability: Check free/busy status for both user and specified attendee
gutts.user_goal: Find times when both parties are free
gutts.evidence: API queries to retrieve availability for user and {name}

gutts.name: Constraint-Based Slot Finding
gutts.capability: Identify time slots matching all constraints (weekly pattern, afternoons, not Fridays, 30min duration)
gutts.user_goal: Get valid time options that meet all preferences
gutts.evidence: Algorithm finds afternoon slots excluding Fridays that fit 30min duration

gutts.name: Recurring Meeting Series Creation
gutts.capability: Create recurring calendar event with proper series configuration and recurrence rules
gutts.user_goal: One-time setup creates ongoing weekly meetings automatically

gutts.name: Meeting Invitation Sending
gutts.capability: Send calendar invitation to specified attendee with meeting details
gutts.user_goal: Attendee receives invitation and can accept/decline
gutts.evidence: Invitation sent to {name} with meeting details and RSVP request

gutts.name: Decline/Conflict Detection & Monitoring
gutts.capability: Monitor for attendee declines or new calendar conflicts in the series
gutts.user_goal: System knows when rescheduling is needed
gutts.evidence: Monitoring system tracks RSVP changes and conflict events

gutts.name: Automatic Rescheduling Logic
gutts.capability: When declined or conflicted, find new slot and send updated invitation automatically
gutts.evidence: Automated workflow: detect decline → find new slot → send update

notes: Generated by Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Matches reference decomposition of 7 GUTTs
